channel.title: Active, Interactive and Authentic travels across Northeastern India on NORTH BY NORTHEAST JOURNEYS | Adventure, Nature and Culture Tours in North-East India
channel.description: Recent content in Active, Interactive and Authentic travels across Northeastern India on NORTH BY NORTHEAST JOURNEYS | Adventure, Nature and Culture Tours in North-East India

item.title: ACTIVE ADVENTURE
item.description: Our Active Adventure tours in northeast India are for the avid as well as novice, be it relaxed or a real test of determination and endurance.

item.title: NATURE & CULTURE
item.description: These 8 states lying in the Indo-Burmese and the Himalayan Bio-diversity hotspots are also home to over 150 unique and distinct ethinic groups.

item.title: LAIDBACK LEISURE
item.description: Holidays that take you away from the maddening crowds, kick off your shoes, destress and enjoy the serenity while we take care of the rest.
